sentence: In September, he endorsed a square-jawed, Army Special Forces veteran, Joe Kent, to challenge Ms. Herrera Beutler, who before her vote had revealed one of the most damning vignettes of Jan. 6 for Mr. Trump.
title: A Long, Hard Year for Republicans Who Voted to Impeach After Jan. 6

sentence: It's going to come from the right, too.? He was one of two Republican candidates, along with Joe Kent of Washington, to attend a September Justice for J6? rally in support of alleged participants of the Jan. 6 Capitol riot still in Washington, D.C., jails.
author: Emily Brooks
title: A top GOP House candidate in Georgia says election doubts still driving voters

sentence: Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler The six-term Washington state lawmaker faces several primary challengers, including the Trump-backed Joe Kent.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: A year later, where 10 House Republicans who voted to impeach Trump stand politically

sentence: Army veteran Joe Kent got the Trump nod in a primary against Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler (R-Wash.).
author: Cristina Marcos
title: Veteran lawmaker's exit has House GOP trending toward Trump

sentence: In southwestern Washington, Trump has endorsed former Army Green Beret Joe Kent against Herrera Beutler.
title: New lines, interesting races in Washington state
